column4: how can i access the filesystem of a windows box connected to my network without having folders shared on it?
not familiar with the samba method, but in windows you could do it with the "net use" command.
well i want to connect from my ubuntu to the windows box. not the other way around.
it may work similar to the following:  smbmount //User:password@workgroupordomain/windowsbox/c /mnt/wherever
